text: The Outlaw and His Wife () is a 1918 Swedish Icelandic drama movie directed by Victor Sjöström (who also stars) and based on the 1911 play by Jóhann Sigurjónsson. It stars John Ekman, Edith Erastoff, Jenny Tschernichin-Larsson. ==Other websites== * Category:1918 drama movies Category:1910s historical movies Category:Swedish drama movies Category:Swedish silent movies Category:Icelandic movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Victor Sjöström Category:Movies set in Iceland Category:Movies set in the 18th century
title: The Outlaw and His Wife
